TopicTitle: Recreate the alien ship from Independence Day

Articles.Content:
So if you've seen the movie Independence Day you know what I'm talking about, aliens come to invade earth in massive ships that destroy city's in seconds.

The only mods allowed are any that provide an anti gravity part or one that makes a giant laser (lazor can be used)

Rules:

1: the UFO must be able to move across the sky by itself,

2: it must float at least above the VABs height

3: it doesn't have to have a weapon of mass destruction (though you get bonus points for it

4: it must be big

5: it must be able to maintain a specific altitude for prolonged periods of time

6: you must post pics of your altitude indicator for height to be counted

7: hack gravity mods must be disabled once you reach the VABs height, if you want to go higher you must use stock engines

Points:

500: UFO is able to float in the sky

500: UFO floats above the VAB

1000: UFO holds a giant laser (like in the movie)

10: each km above the ground inside the atmosphere it floats

300: it can reach space:

400: and return^

1000: reach another planet (1000 per planet)

I've been able to make medium sized UFO's so I know its possible with mods, but my decade old computer can't even handle part counts over 100 so I can't make very big ones.
